name: morality
content:

[ C or U ] a set of personal or social standards for good or bad behaviour and character: They argued for a new morality based on self-sacrifice and honesty.
[ U ] the quality of being right, honest, or acceptable: I have to question the morality of forcing poor people to pay for their medical treatment.
